Description: Rim sherd of large Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus flower in added white outline and added red centres; top of rim glazed; exterior: band of blobs above stopt maeander band running left between pairs of dilute lines; below, dot and billet band; in main frieze below part of pendant triangle as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 260, no. 508)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0544) (phase 2)
